title: you are eligible to earn rewards due to afk behavior
body: Well i think this is kind of unfair since it was not my internet that made my team remake it was the client.....{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It may not have been your own internets fault that you lost connection with our servers, but the other players still had to fight extra hard without a 5th teammate with them. Loot Ineligibility will also not happen after just one left game, and will only happen after you receive an actual penalty.
